column4: whats universe repo ?  i have tried all but proposed to fetch the needed packages for the unsupported envy i'm too tired to check my /etc/apt/source.list :)  humor me
proposed would not be universe would it ?  or is proposed a not so risky thing on a secure machine ?
i've got planets spinning around my head most of the time ;)
proposed it a completely different thing - don't enable it if not for a *very good* reason
